The State of Nooku 2011

04 April 2011 by Johan

Past weekend, the Nooku Team was at the Dutch Joomladays, as both sponsors and speakers. The event sold completely out. Two days with 200 attendees each, that’s a lot of interesting people to meet. Very positive vibe and and superb organisation, one of the best Joomladays I ever attended. A big congrats to everyone who helped to make this happen.

...

The Joomladays NL are coming!

25 March 2011 by Tom

It’s almost time for the Joomla highlight of the year, the Dutch Joomladays! This year they are taking place on the 2th and 3th of April at Kaapdoorn, near Utrecht.

Jamming in Stockholm with Nooku

11 March 2011 by Guest

This is a guest post from Martin Blodau, developer at Pixpro, organiser of the first Joomlanight, and a Nooku community member.

The first Nooku Jam in Stockholm took place on the 5th of February 2011, in the conference area of the Swedish Media Publisher’s Association (TU), the day after the first Joomla Night.

We started the day with an overview about Nooku –...

Nginx for the world… and Joomla

28 February 2011 by Shayne

After months of discussion on the virtues of cloud servers and Nginx, I was recently tasked with moving all the Nooku sites over to Rackspace Cloud. With that in mind, I have documented the basic install process for the benefit of all.

For our install, we will be using Ubuntu 10.04 and installing/configuring:

  • PHP 5.3.x (using fpm-php which is included)...
